website_summaries.verdict: King Dedede’s fans will enjoy tapping this amiibo to their favorite Nintendo games to see what the hammer-toting penguin king will add to the experience.
pros: Tap amiibo to select Nintendo Switch, 3DS, and Wii U games for King Dedede content
Kirby, Meta Knight, and Waddle Dee amiibo available
cons: Without a Nintendo console, it’s "just" a fun toy

customer_reviews.title: It was worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so good I’d wait 30 more years for the 60th anniversary edition. I didn’t open mine so I’m not sure the games it works with, just added it to my collection. It looks great though. My son gets confused over why we can’t open it, I told him he could have it when I died and that started a whole other mess that ended up with him getting his own. A must have. Order two if you plan on telling your kids you’ll die one day.
customer_reviews.author: L. Meeks

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived on time and in perfect condition. However
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and in perfect condition. However, I specifically checked and it was advertised as the US version. It was not. It was the Japanese version. Luckily amiibos are not region locked, so it's still a valid/viable amiibo; however, lying/being mistaken about the version/origin/region of a product is very poor form. In this particular instance everything will work out; for other products it could be a serious issue.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Non-Functional
customer_reviews.text: In the product's description it's written that the figure used to be a display and has a hole drilled in the bottom where it was connected to a platform. Despite assurances that it is still fully functional; the amiibo is unable to be recognized on any of the three systems it was tested on. It still looks fine on the outside and might serve as a collectable model for some but it can't function as in-game content as it was intended to be used. If you drill a hole in the bottom of an amiibo, it can't still be used as an amiibo. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Dzuricky

customer_reviews.title: Link!
customer_reviews.text: Our first amiibo that was bought right before breath of wild came out. Could not be happier with purchase. Pros: Gives great items in game Looks nice. Its link! Is my review missing something? I think that honest, well thought out reviews sometimes are forced to take the place of personal experience while online shopping. I've always appreciated the help I've received from reviews and work hard to return the favor as best as I can. I hope you found this review helpful and if there was anything you thought was lacking or unclear leave a comment and I'll do what I can to address it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stanhouse

customer_reviews.title: Ryu!
customer_reviews.text: Ryu is one of my favorite characters in any video game ever. This is such a pretty little statue for such a nice price. I'm dumbfounded that people leave these in the package. Don't be that way. This is never going to be worth a bunch of money. Unwrap it and put it on a shelf and enjoy how nicely crafted it is. I do wish that Nintendo would do more with the Amiibo functionality in Smash Ultimate. Like, maybe this could unlock a Mii Brawler outfit based on Ryu? Anyway, this is my favorite of the Smash Bros. series of Amiibo.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Yellow Rod Detracts from Design
customer_reviews.text: I like having this amiibo sit on top of my CRT, however I do not like the yellow rod that comes out of Link's pelvis. It makes the amiibo look kind of ugly. This amiibo has tons of uses in games. I think there are maybe four games that use it. I used it in Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild and it gave me Epona, Link's horse. The sword is permanently bent from him being so tightly packed in his packaging. Even with it's flaws I think it was worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: What a bummer
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was pretty banged up. I was expecting it to be in much better condition and wasn’t planning on opening the box myself, but it seems that decision has been taken away from me. I’m on the fence about whether or not I’m going to return it as I was looking to start collecting the Zelda amiibos, but not if this is the kind of quality I’m to expect. Also, it seems as if there’s some damage on the sword. I can’t say whether or not it’s from a original cut from the mold, but it’s a pretty sore sight for something that is considered “new”.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio L.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is stupid. I love nintendo and my son and I play the switch together. The switch is awesome and gets 5 stars, but this amiibo thing is dumb. We were excited to get it and thought it was going to be a cool thing where you can enhance your character and things like that, but it really doesnt do anything and was a big let down. Still got lots of love for nintendo, their consoles and games, but just not this.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Tacchino

customer_reviews.title: Wish I got what i paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, simply. It might seem like a small detail but when i bought this charizard amiibo. It specifically said USA EDITION and what did I get? The UK AND EU edition amiibo of charizard. I've been wanting him in my collection for so long and no all the hype I had to get it became disappointment. I trusted that I would get exactly what was listed and I didnt. And for those wondering the difference the USA edition and euro is it doesn't have on the box th amiibo numbered. This charizard says no. 33 it should say 6+ like the rest of the USA EDITION amiibos.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: A Samus of many Colors
customer_reviews.text: The Samus Aran Amiibo. A worthy addition to any collection. Whether you like to just collect or customize, you won't be disappointed. The pose makes the Amiibo easy to repaint, whether you favor Dark Samus, the Metroid Fusion Suit, the Metroid Prime Light suit, or the Gravity suit, this Amiibo have you covered so long as you are willing to paint it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Package was intact and works like a charm! One of the smallest of the Zelda Amiibos, It's rare drop in Zelda Breath of the Wild is the Twilight Bow (Princess Zelda's bow from Twilight Princess that shoots infinite arrows). It also has a chance of dropping other various bows.
customer_reviews.author: Dicen_420

customer_reviews.title: Princess of Twilight captured gracefully and artfully
customer_reviews.text: Very pricey to get amiibos these days, especially those like this one, which sold out before I had the chance to purchase at retail. Still one of my favorites, as it is elegant and beautiful, as Princess Zelda should be. When used in Breath of the Wild, you have a chance to get one of the best bows in the game; just be patient: it's considered a "rare drop"
customer_reviews.author: Ken'ichi

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: Sonic has been around for a LONG time, but never seems to go out of style. My 9 year old daughter asked for this and she absolutely adores it. The quality is better than the vast majority of these kinds of things, but that was reflected in the price as well. Premium quality comes at a price- but the smile of my little girl is priceless. If you have a kid (or adult) who is a big Sonic fan, this will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: SummitTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift to my significant other, and he adored this. Robin is one of his favorite characters in the video game world and im glad i could give this to him. This product did take a month to arrive, but since it arrived well packaged with no damage to the box, i let that slide. I love this figurine and im thinking about purchasing one for myself in the future, maybe even going to start a collection, who knows. This is an amazing gift as it acts as a figurine, and an asset in games that it is compatible with. I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Azilegna

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Detail, Blue Parts are Odd
customer_reviews.text: I own several Amiibo and this is on the lower end of quality. The detail (on the face specifically) is fairly poor. The clear blue parts are pretty awkward. I'm not sure why they chose blue for those parts. The Falco and Wolf Amiibo look significantly better. It's not terrible, just not great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Gotta make em smile
customer_reviews.text: Detail was excellent. Delivery was lighting fast and tracking delivery was real time GPS, so cool! That aside the 11 yr old I bought this Amibo for is have a blast.. I also bought the Mario Amibo a week later. Great purchase, makes a perfect reward for the little guys who bring home good grades.. 100% satisfied. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Here ...
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Cake topper and game use, multipurpose!!
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem paying full price for this. This was the same price as a cake topper!! This not only made an awesome cake topper, its practical and that we can add it to our ever growing amiibo collection and is useful in the game, as pikachu is my daughters favorite character. Couldn't be more pleased with this. Great quality, packaging, shipment, just all around great, would give more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Keith McCoy & Shannon Esbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Not the prettiest amiibo out there
customer_reviews.text: but you'll still buy one cause its palutena. To be honest its best to look at other retail chains other than amazon due to pricing and since its no longer exclusive here. Best stock one before smash ultimate comes around.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Natal

customer_reviews.title: Ordered US version - received Japanese version
customer_reviews.text: Do not trust USA vs Japanese versions. Ordered USA specific version and have now received the Japanese version twice. There is even a sticker over the barcode. Will be returning yet again.
customer_reviews.author: Extraflyer300

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and details.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this and the other Amiibo figures to just have them as figurines, since i don't have a WiiU yet. So this review won't be based on their functionality as useable figures. I hope to get a WiiU soon, since Smash is my absolute favorite game. Design and detail on the Samus figure are great. Color is vibrant and has a glossy shine. I like having it just to be used as a figurine until i get the game. I would recommend this if either you have Smash for the WiiU or if you are just a fan and want to have a collection of your favorite characters.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: It's an amibo
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure what to say about an amibo... it's a plastic figure that hooks to my son's game. Dosent do a whole lot else, tried to teach it some tricks.. nothing, just stands there looking all link-ish... lazy
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: You'd think this should work in most kids' games...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with all kids' games and is recognized as a generic Amiibo on Yoshi's Woolly World. However, provides Link in Breath of the Wild with Zapshrooms (lightning mushrooms), so that's a hoot.
customer_reviews.author: omahaparent

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart Super Easily
customer_reviews.text: This Pikachu fell apart with little handling after a day. I don't know if it was the manufacture of this particular item or if all of them are like that, but be weary. I gave it two stars because it does come looking exactly like described.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Ohlinger

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, can't wait for Ultimate
customer_reviews.text: The Palutena amiibo feels great to hold and the design is amazing. She is one of my Smash Bros. mains, so take this review with a grain of salt. The amiibo is definitely a must-have since it feels better in my hands than any other amiibo. Now that her counter is buffed as well on the Switch version, pick it up quick.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Maye

customer_reviews.title: Like all the others
customer_reviews.text: Like all the others, this is a not a review of stock issues. One of my favorite characters that was made. Not because of the character himself, but because of the detail and the small parts that look like they were involved in making him. Turned out looking really nice. Wish they would have made the pedastal that he stands on clear instead of blue, its a little distracting, but maybe it is supposed to be clouds or something. It would be nice though if you could actually find one in stock somewhere, I will admit. Got lucking in getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Wadev3

customer_reviews.title: Kirby is adorable, and great quality
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I haven't tried using the amiibo in my game yet; I bought it mainly because I love Kirby and this is adorable. The paint job is flawless and he looks just like the product pictures, and he feels sturdy, like he wouldn't be phased by drops or other rough handling. These could be because of the simplicity of the design, but still! He's now sitting on a shelf next to my anime figures, looking adorable. Very happy with him.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this because it was the USA version. I know they can be used in any region but it is important to me. The picture in the product description is even the USA version. I had already contacted the seller and they were very nice and told me they would be happy to accept the return but I would not have paid $30 for this had I known it would be the Japanese version.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I are huge Mewtwo fans, so when we heard this was going to be released, we knew we'd have to get it! It looks exactly as pictured and the detail is great. It's about the same height as Ganondorf and a little taller than Link, Zelda, and Sheik. I keep it with all of my other figures and I really do think anyone who is a Pokémon fan would love the heck out of it.
customer_reviews.author: мα∂αℓуии

customer_reviews.title: The items for my grandsons are great as they have said and they are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love the items that l purchase for them but the shoulder slap was not what l ordered. The claps were not the golden color that l was needing to use with my cross body shoulder bag.
customer_reviews.author: ljwc

customer_reviews.title: What the Fox are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: Fox is awesome. The build is good solid quality like every amiibo. Shipping was quick. No damage. The signal works flawlessly. I'm not sure what more there is to say.
customer_reviews.author: Suspense

customer_reviews.title: THE AMIIBO ARRIVED WITH DAMAGE.
customer_reviews.text: THIS AMIIBO ARRIVED IN THE WORST CONDITION THAT I HAVE EVER SEEN BEFORE, WHEN I ORDERED IT A FEW YEARS AGO. THE SHIPPING WAS TO MEXICO CITY AND THE PACKAGE BOX WAS WET! THE BLISTER ALSO WAS DESTRUCTED AND SINCE I AM A COLLECTOR OF CLOSED FIGURES, IT WAS A NEGATIVE EXPERIENCE.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: My Marth amiibo is so cool! I love the designs on him
customer_reviews.text: My Marth amiibo is so cool! I love the designs on him!!! AND HE'S JAPANESE TOO!!!! I got him in a Japanese box and everything!!! But the only bad side to it was that one spot on the design on his cape was scratched up. And pretty badly too. But luckily it's in one small spot but still that's how I found it when I opened it. Oh well. It's not like I'll be able to get another one cheap anytime soon. Wasn't cheap getting it but hey could've been a lot worse. So overall I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Super Fighting Robot. MEGA MAN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never in my wildest dreams have I thought Mega Man would get this nice treatment (Better than how Capcom is currently treating him). This amiibo is possibly the best looking one out of all of them. Also, the interaction is grand. Training him to exploit other characters weaknesses, unlocking hidden content such as the Goddess' Harp and a Mega Man costume for Mario Kart 8. Nintendo knew what they were doing. I hope, I really hope that Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate gets amiibo support as well. This one is the first of a team I will assemble in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Marquez

customer_reviews.title: great addition to the amiibo army in my room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this amiibo since there's virtually ZERO Mother 3 merch in america, and I have to say, I'm pretty satisfied! Even for being a relatively old amiibo, Lucas' figurine is still nicely detailed and well-made. He's a neat little thing to display next to my Switch, I'm glad I bought him!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and is a fun figurine, while also doubling as a memory device ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and is a fun figurine, while also doubling as a memory device for Wii U, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived crushed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this will work since it is a gift, but the package had no packing materials inside and arrived completely crushed and open. The case of the item itself was dented. I don't have time to return and reorder so hopefully it works properly.
customer_reviews.author: S.Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but too flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The parts of Link are thin and spindly, and as I feared, the arm broke off within a week. One drop from my five year-old and it snapped right off at the arm/sleeve joint. Luckily, I was able to re-pose it by rotating the arm and gluing it back on, so that he is trailing his sword behind him with the point near the base. It's more compact this way without that sword arm hanging out to one side and a little less likely to hang up and go for a tumble.
customer_reviews.author: Neophyle

customer_reviews.title: Link Amibo is perfect for Zelda fans around.
customer_reviews.text: Amiibo's are super fun and an interesting dimension to Video Games. This Link is fully details and works well even as a type of Home Office Decor.
customer_reviews.author: SSJHulk

customer_reviews.title: Small, Beautiful and great detail
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk at work (I'm a nerd...) I just love Metroid as I grew up with it, and wanted a little something fun at work. I don't intend to use this for it's NFC functionality, just merely something nice to look at. That said, it's surprisingly high quality in terms of feel and the paint job is excellent. The attention to detail is top notch. It stands about 3.5" tall so it's quite small. But for 13$, I felt this was an easy choice
customer_reviews.author: D. Elston

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Love Rosalina, and lucky to get one of the last ones on amazon. Great price, quality aniibo, very satisfied. She looks good added t ok the collection.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Purchsed: Palutena Amiibo
customer_reviews.text: The Amiibo product line ended up being a very successful line and for good measure. The Amiibo themselves are of pretty good quality and they look gorgeous as a collecter's item. Although I would have loved to pay extra for the quality shown at E3 2014. For 12.99 the cost covers the figures themselves and the unlockable in game content is really a bonus. The product in itself is worth it if you really like the character and would like a collectible figure of them.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian

customer_reviews.title: Mint condition Palutena Amiibo.
customer_reviews.text: Its as advertised. Also, there is an aluminum square underneath it that prevents you from scanning while inside the box, unless you remove it from the box 📦, fyi.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ali Limonadi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but packaging issue.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this amiibo about a week ago and it just arrived. Very well made and painted, my last amiibo had paint issues. However, if you are buying amiibo to sell, the packaging was dented a bit and already slightly open. Other than the packaging issue, looks great and came a few days early even. Pros Well made, no paint issues, works with Switch Cons Dented and ripped package Very Pleased with the amiibo though.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 12

customer_reviews.title: Works with Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Works with Nintendo Switch. Yet to receive the bo I got it for but the Amiibo completes the trio as I have a Ganon and Link Amiibo.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Really powerful when trained right.
customer_reviews.text: My Mario is Level 50. He has +100 Defense and +0 on attack and speed. He starts at 90% damage. He lasts till about 280% before he dies. He has 2 trade-offs, speed and attack. Both increase gradually over time. He also has life steal, so overtime he shields when you attack him and heals damage relative to the attack power given to him. In about the first 30 seconds of game play he is back down to about 0% damage. He is OP as heck and usually never dies and gets all the kills against my other Amiibos.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the Peach Amiibo is much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised at the quality and detail that went into this Amiibo. After seeing the actual product pictures (like the one above), I was honestly a little disappointed. When I got the Peach Amiibo, I was shocked to see that it looked much better than the one used as the display model! There is amazing amounts of detail put into this Amiibo in particular. I definitely recommend her if you like the character, or plan on buying other Mario games, like Mario Kart 8, Captain Toad, or Mario Party 10. She's even compatible with Hyrule Warriors!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have 5 Amiibos (yes, amiibos with an "s", I don't care if the plural is amiibo), Palutena, Pit (J), Dark Pit (J), Yoshi and Link. Palutena is my favorite by far, she's heavy so it give the impresion of being sturdy and the details in her ornaments and clothes are amazing. My only complaing is that her eyes are the wrong color, blue and were suppose to be green, which is weird considering how detailed everything else is, but I'm not to take away a star for something so small. Totally worth the $13 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: EBV

customer_reviews.title: Derpy Kong!
customer_reviews.text: I love my diddy kong amiibo, but as with any amiibo, the quality will vary. With mine and some I've seen in stores, the eyes were a bit out of place. It wasn't noticeable from the angle shown on the listing's picture, but on other angles he looks weird. In fact, I named mine Derpy Kong in smash. Besides that, the coloring on mine is spot on no with no paint smudges. Get this for any smash or DK fan, just be wary of the Derpy eye curse that plagues many of these amiibos.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Soldier 93

customer_reviews.title: The goddess of light has been found
customer_reviews.text: After searching stores constantly trying to find her I finally broke down and got her over amazon. I was worried at first since I wouldn't be able to look her over and make sure she was in good shape. She looks awesome though, and the box is intact so she can stay perfectly in there. If you are still looking for her I highly recommend buying her here since the product is in wonderful shape
customer_reviews.author: Rhi Hylia

customer_reviews.title: MARIO
customer_reviews.text: Product came fast with no issues, I love the detail on the pixalated Mario it looks great and colorful great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Paris

customer_reviews.title: Falcon Review!
customer_reviews.text: The Captain Falcon is everything you want in an Amiibo. For those just getting into Amiibo, they are Nintendo's entry into the Toys to Life category. They play differently in different games. In Super Smash Bros. Amiibo will learn your fighting style and make formidable opponents. The construction quality and detail are high. Unlike Nintendo's previous attempt at Toys to Life (Pokémon Rumble Blast), these are far more durable. I would recommend this to anyone who is a fan of Captain Falcon or Nintendo in general.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Love the detail. It's just an amiibo so it won't do anything special and the Palutena one is only for Smash, but it's still a fantastic item for any gamer and especially Kid Icarus fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kenji Wakamaru

customer_reviews.title: nice condition, nice service. 10/10 would order again.
customer_reviews.text: After a long day at work, I get the message that the package arrived at home, that was a pretty fast delivery, I ordered this just a few days back. After opening the box and digging through the styrofoam, I uncover the case, it's in such perfect conditions , it gleams beautifully, it even has a nice scent (perfumed?)... Anyway, I also found a small letter from NES Forever, I'll definitely gonna check your catalog later today, but now it's time to break free and start leveling up this bad boy!
customer_reviews.author: John Shadows

customer_reviews.title: No twilight bow (yet?)
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it does what it's supposed to do, but I have not recieved the twilight bow which is what I was most looking forward for. Have been trying every day for a while now but I usually get a diamond or a common bow. Really would love that twilight bow...
customer_reviews.author: Nora Ramaha

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Kinda silly for me to have bought this, but I now have got the Twilight Bow in Breath of the Wild twice without a lot of fanfare. Patience and reliance upon random odds is the key! I probably could have got it cheaper elsewhere. Great bows drop daily anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Photogf4

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not so durable.
customer_reviews.text: He's so cute! some of the amiibo are okay for a young child to play with. A Yoshi or a Bowser won't get broken from being tossed around. This one, not so much. His sword arm came off within an hour and his base came off within a few days (which is a way is good, because now I can use the base on the wii u and my son can play with the figure. It's not a bad product if you're going to keep it on a shelf, but it's not really meant to be played with so much.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat purchasing a rare NA amiibo for retail price!
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat purchasing a rare NA amiibo for retail price. It felt like winning the amiibo lottery since the availability was flickering in and out before my eyes. Success! This is a reprint Marth, so the facial features and hair are slightly different compared to the first edition Marth. Also please note: if you are a MIB collector, you may be disappointed if your amiibo comes with little dings in the plastic or slightly bent cardboard (both of which happened to me). It was not a big deal to me because the figure itself was fine. It's Marth after all!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Just What He Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got this Link Amiibo as a birthday gift for my son and he loves how it enhances his gameplay. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie1201

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it has been use.... the bottom has velcro on it that fell off and there is a whole in the bottom of the figurine
customer_reviews.author: MamaMac48

customer_reviews.title: I'm been happy. Looks like the packaging could've been re-sealed
customer_reviews.text: Knowingly got this used, having no idea what MOC NEW meant. I expected a lonely figurine in bubble wrap and as long as it works, I'm been happy. Looks like the packaging could've been re-sealed, but I don't care about that. If you do, it looks OK. It's a gift for son, so not going to open it yet. By Xmas, I'll be back to edit if it DOESN'T work. Otherwise, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tripl

customer_reviews.title: Ike Amibo: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Super Smash Bros; I am just collecting the Amibos. The figurine came in perfect condition. * If you are collecting them: Beware that there are three (3) versions: US, Europe, and Japanese. US is a little behind that the other two regions. I purchased Ike thinking it was a US. I am not disappointed, but just keep that in mind. Look closely when you are purchasing through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Henry C

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, works like any amiibo
customer_reviews.text: Robin is one of my mains in Smash, so I obviously had to buy his amiibo. The face and all those other features look great, probably one of the best with Zero Suit Samus’s, and you can actually see what is written on his tome which is all gibberish unfortunately... I really like it, definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Theotime Philippe

customer_reviews.title: I had preordered this toy becuase it looked awesome on the computer screen photos
customer_reviews.text: It arrived sooner than I expected. I had preordered this toy becuase it looked awesome on the computer screen photos. But when it arrived the quality of the painting, like the face, wasnt so top notch. Still I love the packaging and the style of the figurine. I'm displaying it on my glass case so I won't be opening it and therefore can't say anything about the durability. Pretty decent toy. I also want to add that I didnt purchase this for plans to use it for any gaming purposes, just a Zelda nerd here and I had to get this.
customer_reviews.author: Auggie Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeously detailed, a beautiful amiibo to add to your collection.
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful amiibo figure, with such gorgeous details. Palutena is definitely a fantastic addition to amiibo collections, and for Smash bros, she is amazing; may even feel overpowered at times. She also works on Super Mario Maker, and for Yoshi Wooly World as well. The skin she gives Yoshi is quite pretty and cute, and adds an interesting charm in the game. In Mario Maker... she's just another costume, sadly, though she looks pretty cute in 8-bits.
customer_reviews.author: Willie G.R.Top Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: Looks dope, but I also got an extra Amiibo in the box
customer_reviews.text: Ryu looks super dope, but the funniest thing is that in the same package I received an accidental “Zero suit Samus Amiibo!” Didn’t even order it but thank you to the supplier!
customer_reviews.author: Assunta

customer_reviews.title: HADOUKEN!
customer_reviews.text: Cmon. Its Ryu. Its an Amiibo. Worked great. Looks great with my collection. Shipping was Superb
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item as described! Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Used but in like new condition! Item as described. Arrived on time. Works great. My son loved it. I would recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got two, so one came in great but with a little bent on the box while the other one looked like it got crunched, the amiibo didn’t get damaged so that’s the good thing, I hope who ever places the amiibo does a better job next time but yeah this company is awesome and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It is well made, I sort of expecting this cheap hollow plastic ball. It i solid and a good quality. So far I have gotten a rank 3 weapon for Twili midna and 50,000 rupees and 1 rupee from hyrule warriors. :) I am happy I got this and I do not feel like it was a waste of money. I originally was iffy on getting this because I didn't know if it would be worth it. I am happy I can use it on other games too when I get more games.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it as a gift for my brothers xmas gift. It looks as ordered and works. That's all I can ask.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Knight

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Design, and is quite durable. Utilized this figure for many different video games, and it looks great on the entertainment stand.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Marble

customer_reviews.title: Great for Nintendo fans
customer_reviews.text: I love amiibo. I will order most any amiibo I can get my hands on. I love them as a whole. It's a lot of fun for me to fight with my little villager on the regular and watch him become strong and beat me. I highly recommend this for anyone with an interest in Smash or Animal Crossing.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Potter

customer_reviews.title: Amibo
customer_reviews.text: She is very well made but to some people may not like her dress because it feels like platics felt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adorable!
customer_reviews.text: bought her for SSBU and she is the cutest! i have her sitting on my desk and she is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: Great Detail
customer_reviews.text: I have not actually used the amiibo for its intended purpose. I bought this one for my wife as a Christmas present. In her words, "Princess Peach looks like a bad***." In truth she does! The detail on Peach is amazing, and we are looking forward to seeing what games we can use the amiibo in along with Super Smash Bros. If you are looking for a cool collectible or an addition to your Nintendo games then I would grab one.
customer_reviews.author: SaintDemon21

customer_reviews.title: Product was already used in box
customer_reviews.text: Product was listed as new, and despite the wear on the bottom of the box it seemed so. But upon opening and using this amiibo I discovered that it had already been used, because it had already been registered to an owner and contained save data for super smash bros. So despite paying quite a bit more to get a new Sheik amiibo, I got a used sheik amiibo that had just been used through the box.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Eyer

customer_reviews.title: Ryu Amiibo
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my more favored amiibos. Aesthetically it looks very nice it could be a little more detailed in some areas but it looks average by other comparison of amiibos. In game Ryu is one of the best characters and you can train your Amiibo using the classic Street Fighter button inputs to perform more powerful special attacks.
customer_reviews.author: Rubio

customer_reviews.title: They work exactly as they should and its good quality. I look pretty much as shown but ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about Amiibo, They work exactly as they should and its good quality. I look pretty much as shown but as with any mass produced toy it isn't exactly like that but I love them anyways! A worthy addition to anyone's collection!
customer_reviews.author: Cyle R Lapread

customer_reviews.title: Product met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape. I bought it for use with Hyrule Warriors and Smash 4. The Amount did not come with the clear support, rather it came with the yellow support as shown in the pictures. The yellow support does not detract from the overall quality. Also, the sword was not bent or anything like that. Overall, the product met my expectations and I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute amiibo Love it. Mine unfortunately broke but I think it was just from use. Wish it wasn't so expensive now, I'd love to have one again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good condition, but slightly bent
customer_reviews.text: The amiibo is in better condition than expected, the only problem is that the sword of the figure was bent pretty badly. But even retail, the sword's on these things usually come bent a little so it is to be expected and can be fixed. There are a few very minor and almost unnoticeable marks on it too, but if you have this up on display, you won't even be able to tell from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowStar219

customer_reviews.title: get context before buying amiibos.
customer_reviews.text: i mean... you should just know what amiibos and SHEIK is before you buy this. go google / wiki them and make a decision.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Cannon

customer_reviews.title: ... mainly wanted it to unlock the Samus costume in SUPER MARIO MAKER
customer_reviews.text: I mainly wanted it to unlock the Samus costume in SUPER MARIO MAKER, and it worked just fine for that... But then I decided to try it out on the Wii U version of SUPER SMASH BROS and met a disappointing error: It kept telling me the data was corrupted, prompting me to try again, or to see if it could restore the data. It wouldn't let me do either, and just kept telling me it was corrupted, making this amiibo absolutely useless for the game. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Noah 137

customer_reviews.title: Never Seen a Boring Amiibo Yet - This One Holds True to That
customer_reviews.text: I hve yet to be upset with any Amiibo purchase and this one holds up to that and then some. The details are simply amazing for it, not to mention how fun it's functionality adds to the games it connects to!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I got Megaman to pretend there's a new Megaman game.
customer_reviews.text: With Capcom seemingly abandoning Megaman, I got this Megaman Amiibo to give me false hope that this Amiibo will be used in a future Megaman game on the 3DS or Wii U. It's a cool looking Amiibo, nice shades of blue, nice posing inside the packaging. Now all we need is Capcom to stop ignoring us fans. They must hate money or something.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Blagdan

customer_reviews.title: Mega Man!
customer_reviews.text: I had pre-ordered this a long time ago because mega man is one of my favorite characters. Turns out this was actually one of the slightly rare amiibo. Not as much as Villager or all those other store exclusives though. His colors are good and detail is just right. A good balance between price point and quality.
customer_reviews.author: alwaysLooking

customer_reviews.title: Link is legit!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly an awesome figure, the detail is just astounding and I love the in game features that it brings to pass, training it in Smash Bros is a lot of fun, and the weapon that it unlocks for you in hyrule warriors is definitely worth it. In the end though. I would buy this even without any in game functionality, it's just a great piece in general.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I've loved these Amiibos because they have awesome designs of great character, while having functions in games, and especially being very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: NoctisVia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Girl but Big Hands lol!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been collecting Amiibos Especially the Humanoid Ones and i find Palutena as a Valuable piece to my Collection not just because she was exclusive to Amazon but the detail she has i find her design great just like Pit, if theirs a Negative to this Item i will have to say is Palutena's Hands look kind of big for her but that my nit pick other then that shes great.
customer_reviews.author: RyanRodriguez

customer_reviews.title: could you not do it with one of the worst game retailers in America
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this as a japan import through amazon because of Nintendo's ridiculous single retailer exclusive on this and a couple other amiibos. Thanks to this arrangement I've basically had to pay double for Ike, Ness, and Shulk. Nintendo, next time you do a retailer exclusive, could you not do it with one of the worst game retailers in America?
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O.

customer_reviews.title: You got an amiibo in me!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have three games that use them, amiibo have become what I guess Nintendo intended them to be: physical active additional content. I don’t really collect them, and I have very few. I mostly targeted those in which you didn’t notice the plastic that much. Like, where only thing you could see was the figurine, not the base holding it. I’m happy with it and I’m actively using in my sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Andrés

customer_reviews.title: Excellent detail...except for the face
customer_reviews.text: Link's face is not perfectly modeled. In fact, he looks a bit like a woman. However, the details on the Hyrulian shield and his hero's clothes are definitely on point and meticulous in its detail.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: A fun piece and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big fan of Amiibo's and this was one of the first ones I purchased. It is of high quality and great detail. Whether you use it as a Legend of Zelda amiibo or if you just collect Legend of Zelda items, this is a pretty cool piece.
customer_reviews.author: Aloysious Novak Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Although I was semi disappointed by the amount of use I get out of ...
customer_reviews.text: This amiibo wrecks myself and my other amiibos with notable consistency. Although I was semi disappointed by the amount of use I get out of it on SSB, the weapon unlocked on Hyrule Warriors is epic. I don't know if these things are going to catch on since they're a bit small to be particularly decorative by themselves, and as of yet their function is pretty limited, but I don't feel like I wasted my money. If nothing else, it saves me time grinding for items on Smash and rupees on HW.
customer_reviews.author: charles wilson willard

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner and as expected. Thanks! (I can’t comment on functionality because SSB isn’t on Switch yet...I bought it as a collectible)
customer_reviews.author: jenjn79

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of garbage! It did not work and when you call for assistance you get a run around. Nintendo finally provided a game credit, but we never did get it to work. Tried with multiple controllers and on multiple switches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are adorable little collectible statues
customer_reviews.text: So, these are adorable little collectible statues. As far as their usefulness in gameplay, I don't see it. I don't quite get the amiibo phase, but this Mega Man is completely nostalgic for me! Please, Wii, get more and better games for your console so there is actually a reason to buy these amiibos. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Traynor

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars not because of shipping or anything, it’s because it is easy to warp/break glue. It is a thinner model, so be sure you don’t sit on it because that ours break it. This has not happened to me but I see it as a possibility because I set a bag down on it (granted it was a bit heavy) and some glue on the waist cane off. Otherwise it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Unique Nintendo Figurines
customer_reviews.text: This figurines are Unique from Nintendo that is was it make them special. The details are outstanding, colors are bright and the box its eye candy. They make a great collection, some people may open them to play with them but me I just collect them. I will recommend to buy Amiibos if you are a fan of NINTENDO.
customer_reviews.author: Felix L

customer_reviews.title: Mewtwo version is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Mewtwo version, and it does work with super smash Bros ultimate. So its great
customer_reviews.author: Devin

product_meta.title: King Dedede amiibo (Super Smash Bros Series)
feature_bullets: Team up with your amiibo or play against friends in the Super Smash Bros. for Wii U game
Customize your amiibo by adjusting their offensive and defensive capabilities
Build your amiibo to level 50 so that you can crush even the toughest opponents
Tap amiibo to the Wii U GamePad controller and watch your characters come to life in different games in all sorts of exciting ways
Additional amiibo characters and compatible games are coming soon

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars9,876 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
